{"step_by_step_thinking": "Anaphylaxis is a severe allergic reaction that can be mediated by various mechanisms. According to the provided documents, anaphylaxis can be mediated by the release of inflammatory mediators from mast cells and basophils triggered by either immunologic or non-immunologic mechanisms. These mediators include histamine, tryptase, carboxypeptidase A, prostaglandin D₂, leukotriene D₄, platelet-activating factor, and heparin. Therefore, the correct answer is D. All of these.", "answer_choice": "D"}
